reload.name: reload
reload.description: Reload all commands and plugins (admin/owner only).

whoami.name: whoami
whoami.description: Show your user ID, username, and permissions.

come.name: come
come.description: Teleport the bot to a player's position.

grant_permission.name: grant_permission
grant_permission.description: Grant a permission or role to a user

position.name: position
position.description: Display someone's position in the room.

summon.name: summon
summon.description: Teleport a player to your position

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.description: Teleport a player to a specific position
